dt: {bc}a distinct territorial, cultural, or social unit {a_link|enclosed} within or as if within foreign territory

et: French, from Middle French, from {it}enclaver{/it} to enclose, from Vulgar Latin {it}*inclavare{/it} to lock up, from Latin {it}in-{/it} + {it}clavis{/it} key {ma}{mat|clavicle|}{/ma}
shortdef: a distinct territorial, cultural, or social unit enclosed within or as if within foreign territory
